name: PARA Method
description: PARA Method“The system you use to organize information has to be so simple that it frees up your attention, instead of taking more of it. Your system must be give you time, not take time”That’s why we create PARA Method template. You can view and organize all of your tasks, projects, areas and resources inside Notion using the PARA method.Core to his method is PARA – a system for organizing information into Projects, Areas, Resources, and an Archive. features: Notionis the ultimate productivity app, offering an all-in-one workspace to organize work, projects, and ideas. It's highly versatile, with tools for databases, wikis, notes, and more.; This is a Notion public website. Just bookmark it! :)
